title: Personal Tech Has Changed. So Must Our Coverage of It.
description: Our tech problems have become more complex, so we are rebooting the Tech Fix column to focus on the societal implications of the tech we use.
dc:creator: Brian X. Chen
media:credit: Christie Hemm Klok for The New York Times
